posts.post_title: T206's for sale SL'ers off to ebay
posts.post_content:
Hi, I have some T206's that I would like to sell.

Southern Leaguer Carlos Smith P350 Now on ebay.

Souther Leaguer Seitz P350 SOLD Thank you!

Doyle Throwing SC150  Now on ebay.

Murphy Horizontal SC350 Now on ebay.

Raymond P350  for $15  SOLD Thank you!

Tannehill P350/460  $15 SOLD Thank you!

PayPal, Money Orders, or personal checks are all fine.  For purchases $50 or more I will pay for insurance.  [url]rickmcquillan@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks, Rick

Hi,  all offers will be considered.

Thanks!
